TextView.android:text: Carry a pepper spray with you, always and keep it handy. Don’t tuck it too low in your bag. Hold your bag as tightly as you can when you are taking public transport. You can use it to hit your predator When you are walking on a road, keep your mobile phone handy but avoid using it. Being on the phone makes you less alert. When you are travelling in an auto alone, make sure you share the auto number with someone in your family even if it’s during the day.
